website_summaries.verdict: Fits the Roman faucet design perfectly with great-looking materials.
pros: Available in three different finishes of stainless, chrome, or oil-rubbed bronze
Spout has a perfect curvature to provide just the look you want
Straight handles provide convenience and enhance the simple lines in the design
cons: Must purchase rough-ins and other parts separately, driving up cost

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We decided to swap out our old out of date Delta chrome and brass fixtures in our master bath and were thrilled to discover this deck mounted faucet and tub spout that was compatible with the old components. My husband had this installed in less than 10 minutes. We ended up using this same style faucets on our vanity and shower, as well. Can’t beat Deltas lifetime warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Angela D.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but flawed!
customer_reviews.text: Received this product and unlike previous version you can not adjust the hot/cold handles to go each direction as discribed. Both handles face the same direction with the package. Fyi i have tried and flip the valve but it does not fix the issue. The do not make a valve seperate for each direction anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Jared loosli

customer_reviews.title: Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a townhouse and the previous owners started a bathroom renovation with this fixture on the sinks but never fully completed the renovation leaving chrome/brass fixtures in the shower and bathtub. I picked this up and it perfectly matches what is already installed in my bathroom. The only criticism I have is the hot and cold handles seem out of proportion and small when compared to the faucet neck itself. This however could be more a result of the size of the bathtub itself as it's a fairly big whilrpool/bath that it's attached to. Extremely easy installation of the item though.
customer_reviews.author: David Homel

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: What can you say; it’s nothing but a name, a faucet and two handles. I can’t for the life of me figure out why these simple fixtures are upwards of $200 and don’t even come with new valves, springs and seats, but it works and looks nice. Still, I’m knocking off 2 stars for value since it costs so ridiculously much for essentially a pipe and two handles.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Misuk

customer_reviews.title: Beatiful faucet
customer_reviews.text: This a a beautiful replacement for my roman tub faucet from 23 years ago. As noted on another reviewers comments, the delta faucet I was replacing used an extra pin and hole to stabilize it. The faucets sold now don't cover that hole. We tried filling it it so it's not that noticeable, but it is a shame the new faucets don't have a a larger base. Another note - I didn't need a rough in probably because I was replacing a delta faucet with a delta faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: It looks so nice installed and has amazing water pressure
customer_reviews.text: My local building supply store didn't carry this in stock and it was much cheaper on Amazon. It looks so nice installed and has amazing water pressure. I have the matching faucets for my sinks, also. I am definitely a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with their appearance and the cost via Amazon was ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this faucet combination for my garden tub to match the double sink faucets that I purchased 3 or 4 years ago. I'm happy with their appearance and the cost via Amazon was much better than I could find elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Decent Buy
customer_reviews.text: The way that the handles are is a bit of a mess. Will have to re-read the instructions, but the handles don't pull the same way when turning water on. One you pull towards you and the other you have to push away from you to turn the water on. Could be an install error - but the product itself is nice. Great upgrade to our previous 1990s design.
customer_reviews.author: Makenzi

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: It came with all of its parts and was easy to install. I had differences in plumbing on my end, but once I addressed that issue, the faucet worked well, and no issues to report.
customer_reviews.author: DSB

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but water comes out narrow and straight like a sink
customer_reviews.text: The water comes out really fast more like a sink and not a bathtub. Instead of pouring out like you would expect a bathtub to do the water shoots out straight which splashes it. We were able to use our existing faucet and just swap out the hardware. Very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost_fan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived quicker than expected and looks great. The stream that comes out of the faucet is a bit extreme but not terrible. I would purchase again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MEH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, it arrived on time and exactly like it was described.
customer_reviews.author: BSEmerson

customer_reviews.title: Easy Upgrade of bath hardware
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my old 90’s chrome hardware. No need for a new valve. Just need a channel lock wrench to lower the valve stems slightly to allow for a height difference.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Works great with hand shower.
customer_reviews.text: I attached a hand shower. Threaded aerator makes it possible! Tried to fix that problem for years. A separately purchased adapter made it possible. Have to remove the aerator.
customer_reviews.author: Debra B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my whirlpool
customer_reviews.text: Got this to match my sink faucets and it is a nice heavy duty faucet with brass fittings. I purchased the fittings to go with it through amazon too. It is s nice rich color and is well made
customer_reviews.author: rnforeveryoung

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks great
customer_reviews.text: For someone who never installed a faucet, it turned out great (youtube was also a big help). It looks really good!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love the new look
customer_reviews.text: Replaced builder grade plastic handles and a chrome faucet with this. Not cheap- but much better looking. Purchased Delta because the existing faucet was Delta and it all replaced easily.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Love how these look in my new remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Love how these look in on my bathroom vanities. We are still finishing up our remodel of the bathroom so haven't had a chance to put them under pressure. They look great, are a quality product, great price and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja fruit and greens McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Part
customer_reviews.text: High quality plumbing part that fits well and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: make sure your cartridges are good or order them
customer_reviews.text: looks nice but would be a better sell if cartridges came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ross

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful faucet for a tub. You will need to purchase the rough in kit separately to install this piece which makes it a little expensive but the unit is very high quality. Deep, rich browns and just the right amount of bronzing.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: Really nice look. Couldn't get the tub faucet to tighten completely but that was the fault of the original plumbing configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this faucet set. I looks great. My plumber said it was easy to install. It's very sturdy. I love the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kameka

customer_reviews.title: Great look!
customer_reviews.text: We updated our Masterbath, this is exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This fuacet fills our tub fast. Glad I spent the extra money on this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Powell

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for when doing our bathroom renovation (we used this on a drop-in corner tub). Easy to install, very sleek and modern looking. You do need to purchase the separate "rough," but unfortunately that is typical when buying a Roman tub faucet (had no clue about this issue until we went to purchase and looked at the reviews). Good quality, glad we chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Papaya

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this compared to our old faucet. Heavy metal.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Tafoya

customer_reviews.title: If you have a Delta faucet, Replace with Delta faucet
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 22 year old Delta gold and chrome faucet. Fit perfect. Didn't have to change the cartridges or inner pipes. Handles and spout fit where the old ones were.
customer_reviews.author: danishduke

customer_reviews.title: Difficult install
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our master bath soaker tub. Our contractor had to have two different plumbers install it because it was such a pain. This in turn was added cost for us. It looks okay, nothing special. Wouldn’t buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was able to install this easily over existing hardware for an old (late 1990's) Delta ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to install this easily over existing hardware for an old (late 1990's) Delta faucet. As the description says it is the top portion only, but this worked perfectly for me as I was able to simply replace the superficial portions of the faucet and handles. Easy installation. Seems sturdy and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: mrae

customer_reviews.title: Very nice faucet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a soaker tub in the master bath of our new home, functions as expected and looks wonderful. Always happy with Delta plumbing fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Connie B.

customer_reviews.title: The handles may need a washer.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, looks good, just seemed a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice faucet. It seems to be a higher quality piece than the “box store” version. It was installed professionally by a licensed plumber so I can’t comment too much on installation.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my garden tub. It looks beautiful! Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Randle

customer_reviews.title: High end look
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, we did our bathroom and these fixtures are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This was an perfect replacement for an old 1990's delta polished brass roman tub trim. The existing delta rough-in worked perfect with the new faucet. To get the cold handle to open by turning counter clockwise you just have to remove the cartridge and turn it 180 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Cheaper than in store price. Installed in my Roman tub. Classy upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Ani S.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to switch out since we already had all ...
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a contractor grade Delta chrome faucet with this trim. Super easy to switch out since we already had all of the valves and stuff needed. Love the look of this set. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, just had to return them for another size.
customer_reviews.author: GameDay Ready

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, solid and looks and feels amazing. Especially compared to the crappy plastic crystal knob situation that it replaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw/Defective part
customer_reviews.text: Do you offer replacement on defective products? I tried to install your faucet yesterday but the set screw couldn't go in due to a design flaw/defect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match to replace the older style Delta roman tub fixtures. I had the big brass set. If your contractor installed the swivel pin on your old faucet, this spout will not cover that hole so be sure to remove the old One first to check. Worse comes to worse, you can fill the swivel pin hole if it is there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous about ordering this online as I had not seen it. I was redoing my bathroom and the roman tub faucets are not available in stores in my area. The shipping was fast and I was very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love the Faucet!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this faucet! It looks so great on my freestanding tub! And at a way better price than I could find anywhere else. Would order again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: MaeBerry

customer_reviews.title: My installer informed me that the installation was much better on this than ones I had
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had purchased sink faucets at Lowes. My installer informed me that the installation was much better on this than ones I had puechased
customer_reviews.author: Carol Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!/Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Took about 1/2 hour to remove the old delta knobs and spout and replace with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Rick (NC)

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid feel and good chrome look
customer_reviews.text: Installed on in a powder room a year and a half ago and liked it so got two more for a bathroom renovation.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great faucet for the price. You are going to spend a lot more money at the store and you have to go get it... no brainer hre
customer_reviews.author: I like I buy

customer_reviews.title: delta foundations BT2796-OB Roman Tub Trim, oil bronze
customer_reviews.text: it's pretty, looks great, but I didn't realize when I ordered it that it needed a full trim kit. that cost me money because my plumber had to make two trips and they can be pretty pricey.
customer_reviews.author: oldjumpergal

customer_reviews.title: Great Tub Faucet
customer_reviews.text: This tub faucet looks great and has good water flow. Definitely recommend if you need an oil rubbed bronze tub faucet, it's a great price and product.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with all parts to install! Way to expensive to not come with all parts!!
customer_reviews.author: Armendia C.

customer_reviews.title: on time in good
customer_reviews.text: Ok, came in as described, on time in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Ellison

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC  faucet set.
customer_reviews.text: Folks this is absolutely beautiful set of faucets. My wife and I recently remodeled out bathroom, and we bought most of the plumbing items from Amazon. This was another satisfying experience.
customer_reviews.author: John & Carrie Swatsell

customer_reviews.title: Tub faucet
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great but didn't work for us. We were told by Delta that a T27 product would be compatible with our old unit. We just wanted to switch the faucet, not redo the valves etc. Unfortunately, this model didn't fit so we are unable to use. However, Amazon/vendor service was prompt and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: azann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Faucet
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is gorgeous! It looks wonderful deck mounted on my deep soaker garden tub. It fills the tub very quickly and matches all my other ORB finishes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like these - look very nice in new bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jenine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to anyone looking to upgrade your bathroom on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant bathtub faucet. I would recommend to anyone looking to upgrade your bathroom on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: sharrie abrams

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Delta is the best on the market in todays plumbing. Far exceeds quality of other brands. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anita in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Faucet
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is not only beautiful but sturdy. It was also very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was received pronto, and it's already installed and is exactly the color and style we were looking for. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte R Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and two of the matching sink faucets and they look great. They could be a bit heavier and sturdier, but they work fine and are more stout than a similar Peerless that I bought. Note that the valves for hot and cold are NOT included - the handles simply attach to existing valves. This wasn't a problem for me as I was replacing a Delta tub faucet, but otherwise I would have had to go buy valves. This is a good looking faucet!
customer_reviews.author: BBQ Phil

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bathtub faucet nd it matches the other oil rubbed bronze accessories we purchased. It is easy to install as a replacement. We replaced the gold colored faucet and handles.
customer_reviews.author: JCMEGHAN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This trim kit installed in about 15 minutes and worked like a charm. Great looking kit that changed the whole look of our tub room.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: This is all the parts I received. Nothing I needed to install a faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Feeling ripped off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was a Delta and I wanted quality. I should have read the other reviews more carefully - this is ONLY the faucets, none of the plumbing hook ups. Makes it very expensive for what you get, my husband, who has been a builder for 30 years, has never seen faucets sold like this. Had to order more parts to install.
customer_reviews.author: Collette in Canada

customer_reviews.title: A great faucet, this matches the Foundations line from Delta perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is really perfect for this line from Delta. I am far from a plumber and installed it on an existing manifold on a large garden tub. This faucet does not come with the manifold. If you are simply replacing an outdated Delta faucet this one works perfectly. I was changing from an old polished brass one to this one. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice faucets
customer_reviews.text: We were upgrading the bath and changed sink faucets so replaced tub as well. Easy to install and works great, no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Dwane

customer_reviews.title: awsome faucet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet! Had loads of compliments on how nice it is! Quality!!! Would recommend it to anyone looking anytime! Priced right too.
customer_reviews.author: stinger

customer_reviews.title: good finishing
customer_reviews.text: I am upgrading my bathroom, so I am replacing all faucets, the provide me with the required kit when need, everything run trouble-free
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Benson

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful faucet. Went well with my decor. My only complaint is that it didn't come with all the valves. I knew ahead of time based on other reviews that I had to buy that separate (thanks other reviewers) but I found it annoying regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Purse-Ho

customer_reviews.title: Handles and faucet only
customer_reviews.text: You are only buying the handles and faucet. If you are like me and don't know anything about plumbing you may need more parts. They are very nice handles, very solid and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Himmerette

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, however, both handles turned to the same direction, not in either direction like displayed in the pic. Very disappointed considering the price of the faucet! While ordering from amazon saved me about $75 compared to the big box hardware store, not being able to return it like I could have there defeated the purpose, considering I had to spend an additional $65 on another set of handles. This resulted in only a $10 savings. Not worth it considering the amount of time and energy spent on what should have been a simple project!
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Replaced existing Delta chrome/polished brass set with this without any ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced existing Delta chrome/polished brass set with this without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice faucet
customer_reviews.text: We were thrilled to be able to replace our shiny brass and this faucet looks great. Our previous faucet was Delta also. We will have to do a slight mod to shorten the plastic part on the valve to make this fit but should be very easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking Tub Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Only drawback is that the "guts" aren't included for new construction ~ so if you are considering this faucet for a new home, will need to find the actual guts to work out for your plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Odom

customer_reviews.title: Not an actual faucet
customer_reviews.text: Warning! This is not a complete faucet. It is only the sleeve and handles. All of the internal parts must be purchased separately. This fact should be made much clearer in the title and description. I am waiting to find out how much the other items cost before I return it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. King

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Trim kit. It installed easily on the exisiting system. This does not come with the valves so make sure you order that seperately if your doing a new install.
customer_reviews.author: Soldier

customer_reviews.title: This was the BEST investment -- love this Roman Tub Trim -- makes ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the BEST investment -- love this Roman Tub Trim -- makes my jacuzzi look like a million bucks!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bies

customer_reviews.title: BAD INFO
customer_reviews.text: JUST LIKE ALOT OF OTHER PEOPLE WHO PURCHASED THIS ITEM IT FAILS TO TELL YOU IT DOES NOT COME WITH THE ROUGH IN PARTS BUT IF YOU CHECK WITH LOWES.COM YOU WILL FIND NITHER DOES THEIRS AND EVEN THEY FAIL TO TELL YOU ITS ONLY THE TRIM..SO THIS MUST BE THE WAY DELTA SELLS TO EVERYONE . SO NOW I AM STUCK TRYING TO FIND THE PARTS NEEDED AND SO FAR HAVEN'T FOUND THEM .DON'T UNDERSTAND WHY DELTA DOES NOT INCLUDE THE PARTS NECESSARY TO COMPLETE THE JOB ....
customer_reviews.author: Moondoggie

customer_reviews.title: Recent purchases with Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing wrong with this faucet. The seller did a great job getting this to me in a timely manner. It just didn't fit the space I had available.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Not all of the parts are here to install the faucet. Now I have to figure out what else I need. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi A.

product_meta.title: Delta Faucet Windemere 2-Handle Widespread Roman Tub Faucet Trim Kit, Deck-Mount, Stainless BT2796-SS (Valve Not Included)
product_meta.description:
Color:StainlessDelta Windemere: Roman Tub Trim

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Clean styling and simple lines define the Foundations series. Practical and hardworking, this series withstands the test of time. Delta faucets complement you, your style, your life, the way you think, work and move throughout the day. For the kitchen, bath and shower, think about what you want from your faucets. Then let Delta help you realize it in a way no other brand can.
feature_bullets: Simple, elegant lines complement traditional decor
Rough-in kit not included & Must order R2700 or R2707 separately

specifications.Warranty Description: All parts and finishes of the Delta faucet are warranted to the original consumer purchaser to be free from defects in material and workmanship for as long as the original consumer purchaser owns their home. Delta recommends using a professional plumber for all installation and repair.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars191 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
